title: String Manipulation Master
description:
Practice essential string operations including formatting, slicing, and methods.

Create a program that:
1. Takes a full name (first and last name separated by space)
2. Extracts the first name and last name
3. Creates an email address: firstname.lastname@company.com (all lowercase)
4. Prints a formatted message

Example:
Input: "John Smith"
Output: "Welcome John Smith! Your email is: john.smith@company.com"
starterCode:
# Get full name input
full_name = input("Enter your full name: ")

# Extract first and last name


# Create email address (lowercase)


# Print formatted message
solution:
# Get full name input
full_name = input("Enter your full name: ")

# Extract first and last name
first_name, last_name = full_name.split()

# Create email address (lowercase)
email = f"{first_name.lower()}.{last_name.lower()}@company.com"

# Print formatted message
print(f"Welcome {full_name}! Your email is: {email}")
hints: Use .split() to separate the name into parts

testCases.expectedOutput: Welcome John Smith! Your email is: john.smith@company.com
Welcome ALICE JOHNSON! Your email is: alice.johnson@company.com
Welcome Bob Wilson! Your email is: bob.wilson@company.com
